Introduction

Nishijima Renta, also known as Renta, is a Japanese rapper and lyricist under Yoshimoto Kogyo. He is a member of the Japanese boy group OCTPATH and a former member of the boy group TO1.

Renta was first known for appearing and competing in the survival show Produce 101 Japan Season 2 where he finished in 16th place.

On June 17, 2022, WAKEONE announced that Renta would be joining TO1. He later debuted on July 28, 2022, with the group's third mini album Why Not??.

On September 22, 2023, Renta posted a handwritten letter on his Instagram Account in both Korean and Japanese announcing that he had left TO1 to pursue solo activities.

On November 19, 2023, Renta was announced as a member of the Japanese boy group OCTPATH.
